conflicts.description: dire: Dire is included in Pythia8 since version 8.301
conflicts.name: ^pythia8@8.301:

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The HepMC package is an object oriented, C++ event record for High
Energy Physics Monte Carlo generators and simulation.
dependencies.name: hepmc

dependencies.description:
LHAPDF is a general purpose C++ interpolator, used for evaluating PDFs
from discretised data files.
dependencies.name: lhapdf

dependencies.description:
The Pythia program is a standard tool for the generation of events in
high-energy collisions, comprising a coherent set of physics models for
the evolution from a few-body hard process to a complex multiparticle
final state.
dependencies.name: pythia8

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

description:
DIRE (short for dipole resummation) a C++ program for all-order
radiative corrections to scattering processes in high-energy particle
collisions.
name: dire

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
